message.content:
I need to identify the value of carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period based on the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see a line item called "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period. This is the standard accounting term for the cost of inventory items that have been sold.

From the income statement:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 1,015,000.00

The Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) is the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1015000.00'} }
```
